mapper.insert: insert into request(from_user_id, plan_no, to_user_id) values (#{fromUserId}, #{planNo}, #{toUserId})
mapper.select: select request_no, from_user_id, P.plan_no as plan_no, plan_title, to_user_id, request_status, request_create_time from request R join plan P on R.plan_no = P.plan_no where request_status = 1 and to_user_id = #{userId}
